amendment.description: To reaffirm the constitutional and statutory protections accorded sealed domestic mail, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 847 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 843. (consideration: CR S4467-4470; text: CR S4467-4468) To reaffirm the constitutional and statutory protections accorded sealed domestic mail, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 847 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 843.
